title: 日神鋼數據造假事件擴大 生產主力來自中國

replies.msg:
http://news.ltn.com.tw/news/business/breakingnews/2222927


〔即時新聞／綜合報導〕日本神戶制鋼所數據造假風波擴大，從原先受害約200多家日企，擴大到中、日、韓等約500多家企業，含有大韓航空等大企業，更發現，神鋼造假數據的主力生產商是在中國3家公司。

綜合媒體報導，神鋼在中國設有5家公司，這次涉竄改數據工廠有3家，包括蘇州神鋼電子材料有限公司、江陰法爾勝杉田彈簧制線有限公司、神鋼新確彈簧鋼線（佛山）有限公司；全部生產神鋼主力製品，但其他工廠也使用這些造假數據的產品，佔鋼鐵產品銷售額的4成左右。

綜合媒體報導，日本第三大鋼鐵企業神戶制鋼所造假醜聞愈演愈烈，8月底時發現，旗下公司涉長期篡改部分鋁、銅製品出廠數據，以次充好出售產品，初期涉竄改的產品約有1.93萬噸鋁、2200噸銅和1.94萬單位鑄鋁產品，但事件越爆越多，增加140噸鐵粉和6600多單位的生產液晶屏所用的合金材料，13日神鋼再證實，又有包括銅合金管、鋼線材的9種產品涉造假技術數據；「中招」企業擴大到500家。

受造假醜聞風暴襲捲，東京股市神鋼股票連日暴跌；截至13日收盤，其股價比年初以來最高位已跌去逾40%。

以下有關日本本土嘅用黑字，有關中國子公司嘅用紅字，而有關於馬來西亞或泰國子公司嘅用藍字

十月八日公佈: http://www.kobelco.co.jp/english/releases/1197808_15581.html
Main products: Aluminum flat-rolled products, aluminum extrusions, copper strips, copper tubes, and aluminum castings and forgings
Shipping period: September 1, 2016 - August 31, 2017
Quantity: Aluminum products (flat rolled, extrusions) About 19,300 tons
Copper products (strips, tubes) About 2,200 tons
Aluminum castings and forgings About 19,400 units


十月十一日公佈: http://www.kobelco.co.jp/english/releases/1197808_15581.html

Nonconforming Product 1
■ Product
• Steel powder for powder metallurgy (sintering)
■ Place of manufacture
• Takasago Works, Kobe Steel, Ltd.
■ Quantity shipped in fiscal 2016, etc.
• Quantity shipped in fiscal 2016, etc. (one type of steel powder to one customer)
•140 tons/year (Kobe Steel’s production of the subject type of steel powder: 2,500 tons/year)
■ Improper conduct
• Improper rewriting of inspection data of a product outside the compact density agreed with the customer

Nonconforming Product 2
■ Product
• Sputtering target materials
■ Place of manufacture
• Takasago Works, Sputtering Target Business, Kobelco Research Institute, Inc.
■ Quantity shipped from November 2011 onward
• Number of customers: 70 companies / Number of pieces shipped: 6,611
■ Improper conduct
Not conducting tests agreed with customers and the improper rewriting of inspection data with regard to products outside the component values agreed with customers

十月十三日公佈: http://www.kobelco.co.jp/english/releases/files/20171013e.pdf

Nonconforming product 1
■ Products
• Copper alloy tubes and molds
■ Manufacturer
• Shinko Metal Products Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from September 2016 to August 2017
• Copper alloy tubes No. of customers: 42 Shipping weight: About 700 tons
• Molds No. of customers: 137 No. of pieces shipped: About 5,300 pieces
■ Improper conduct
• A portion of the inspections (dimensions, etc.), which Kobe Steel had agreed with customers,
was not conducted.
• Rewriting of inspection data prescribed in the specification sheet, which Kobe Steel had
agreed with customers.

Nonconforming product 2
■ Product
• Copper tubes (capillary tubes)
■ Manufacturer
• Kobelco & Materials Copper Tube Malaysia Sdn. Bhd.
■ Shipment quantity from September 2016 to August 2017
• No. of customers: 28 Shipping weight: About 750 tons
2
■ Improper conduct
• A portion of the inspections (dimensions, etc.) and tests (mechanical properties, etc.), which Kobe Steel had agreed with customers, were not conducted.

Nonconforming product 3
■ Product
• Copper tubes
■ Manufacturer
• Kobelco & Materials Copper Tube (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from September 2016 to August 2017
• No. of customers: 5 Shipping weight: About 1,140 tons
■ Improper conduct
• Tensile testing, which Kobe Steel had agreed with customers, was not conducted, and instead a hardness test was substituted.Instead, tensile testing was shortened, and an estimated calculation was entered as tensile strength based on the results of the hardness test.

Nonconforming product 4
■ Products
• Aluminum alloy wires and aluminum alloy bars
■ Manufacturer
• Shinko Aluminum Wire Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from September 2016 to August 2017
• Aluminum alloy wires, bars No. of customers: 2 Shipping weight: 12.5 tons
■ Improper conduct
• A portion of the inspection items, which Kobe Steel had agreed with customers, was not conducted, and inspection data was rewritten.
Unmeasured microalloyed chemical values were entered, and a portion of the tensile properties, which were target values for reference, was used.

Nonconforming product 5
■ Product
• Copper strips
■ Manufacturer
• Suzhou Kobe Copper Technology Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from September 2016 to August 2017
• Copper strips No. of customers: 2 Shipping weight: 31 tons
■ Improper conduct
• Rewriting of inspection data of prescribed specifications (dimensions, etc.), which Kobe Steel had agreed with customers.

Nonconforming product 6
■ Product
• Steel wires
■ Manufacturer
• Jiangyin Sugita Fasten Spring Wire Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from June 2011 to July 2017
• No. of customers: 1 Shipping weight: 3,525 tons
■ Improper conduct
• A portion of the inspection, which Kobe Steel agreed with the customer, was not conducted.

Nonconforming product 7
■ Product
• Steel wires
■ Manufacturer
• Kobelco Spring Wire (Foshan) Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from December 2015 to April 2017
• No. of customers: 1 Shipping weight: 306 tons
■ Improper conduct
• A portion of the inspection, which Kobe Steel agreed with the customer, was not conducted.

Nonconforming product 8
■ Product
• Special steel
■ Manufacturer
• Nippon Koshuha Steel Co., Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from June 2008 to May 2015
• No. of customers: 19 Shipping weight: 3,990 tons
■ Improper conduct
• Rewriting the results of tests, which Kobe Steel agreed with the customers, prescribed in the specification sheets

Nonconforming product 9
■ Product
• Stainless steel wire
■ Manufacturer
• Shinko Wire Stainless Company, Ltd.
■ Shipment quantity from April 2007 to May 2016
• No. of customers: 1 Shipping weight: 553 tons
■ Improper conduct
• Rewriting the results of tests, which Kobe Steel agreed with the customer, prescribed in the specification sheet
